description: Detects the exploitation of Microsoft Exchange ProxyToken vulnerability as described in CVE-2021-33766 Author: Florian Roth, Max Altgelt, Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: CVE-2021-33766 Exchange ProxyToken Exploitation
query: (http.response.status_code:"500" AND url.original:*\/ecp\/* AND ((http.request.method:"POST" AND url.original:*\/RulesEditor\/InboxRules.svc\/NewObject*) OR url.original:*SecurityToken\=*))
